item.title: Prolonged Eye Contact and Attraction: What The Science Tells Us
Who initiates divorce the most? Men or women?
item.description: Pop quiz. Who initiates divorces and break-ups? Men or women?

item.title: The Secretary Problem Explained: Dating Mathematically
item.description: I was, to put it mildly, something of a mess after my last relationship imploded.

item.title: Love Is Not A Choice And Other Tools For Thinking
item.description: I’m not much of a romantic. If I wanted to hack romance I’d start with going through all the literature on the mate preferences of chimpanzees, bonobos, and great apes generally.

item.title: Where are the women in the IT industry?
item.description: It has become fashionable as of late for media outlets like Gawker and others to attack Silicon Valley, math, computer science, and the hard sciences generally for being unfriendly to women.

item.title: Polya Urn Model Dissolves The Gender War
item.description: Now listen, you queer, you stop calling me a crypto-Nazi or I’ll sock you in the goddamn face and you’ll stay plastered.

item.title: Bad at math? Have you tried steroids?
item.description: Men with lower T performed better than other groups on measures of spatial/mathematical ability, tasks at which men normally excel.

item.title: Is veganism for women?
item.description: I recently tried my hand at making this bean-based, vegan taco filling (recommended), and noticed something curious while reading the recipe’s comments:

item.title: Are introverts ever happier than extroverts?
item.description: Here’s one actual perk of being a wallflower: Although extraverts are generally happier than introverts, Kette (1991) found that extraverted prisoners were less happy than introverted prisoners.

item.title: Women Friends are Better Friends
item.description: The Justice Department now seems to be saying that prison rape accounted for the majority of all rapes committed in the US in 2008, likely making the United States the first country in the history of the world to count more rapes for men than for women.
